num_months.description: The number of months to run the calculations for (max of 2400).

market_config_path.description: Market config file path from the 'rent_buy_invest' directory

rent_config_path.description: Rent config file path from the 'rent_buy_invest' directory.

house_config_path.description: House config file path from the 'rent_buy_invest' directory.

start_date.description: Start date of the financial projection (the date when the home ownership is transferred to you).
